definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: purify, select (cf. As. barâru, be shining, in deriv. Zim:BP 46. 73 Belser:BAS ii. 154; Ar. bir=un pious, kind, true; br he was pious, good, virtuous, honest)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[בָּרוֹתִי]] Ez Eze 20:38; Inf. sf. [[לְבָרָם]] Ec 3:18, Ges:§ 67 R, 3; cf. [[לָבוּר]] Ec 9:1 (si vera l.) as metaplastic form, but on text vid. [[בּוּר]] supra p. 101; Pt. pass. m. [[בָּרוּר]] Job 33:3 + 4 t.; f. [[בְּרוּרָה]] Ne 5:18, Zep 3:9; —

purge out, purify: [[וּבָרוֹתִי]] [[מִכֶּם הַמּׂרְדִים]] and I will purge out from among you the rebels Ez Eze 20:38; [[שָׂפָה בְּרוּרָה]] a purified lip Zep 3:9; [[בָּרוּר מִלֵּלָוּ]] utter in a pure, sincere manner Job 33:3.
choose, select, only Pt. and in Chronicler: chosen, valiant men 1Ch 7:40; porters 1Ch 9:22; musicians 1Ch 16:41; sheep Ne 5:18.
cleanse, make shining, polish, pt. pass. [[חֵץ בָּרוּר]] polished arrow Is 49:2 (cf. De & Je 51:11 infr.)
test, prove Ec 3:18 [[לְבָרָם]] [[הָאֱלֽהִים]] that God may prove them (RV);—on Ec 9:1 v. [[בּוּר]].

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ceremonially, the bearers of the sacred vessels Is 52:11.
[[תִּתְבָּרַר]] Ps 18:27 = [[תִּתָּבָר]] 2Sa 22:27 shew oneself pure, just, kind.
